item.description:
(Info Submitted by The NYC Steppers. This event is not hosted by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006)



The New York Steppers present Big City Steppin’ Weekend July 30 – August 1, 2010


FRIDAY
****NEW LOCATION FOR FRIDAY NIGHT PARTY**** (as of 7/25/10)

The location for the Friday night party on July 30 will now take place at Jay-Z's multimillion-dollar sports lounge -
The 40/40 Club
Enjoy one of New York's most upscale clubs with a modern sports decor, excellent menu and speciality drinks.
10pm – 2am
Admission: $20
Dress code: Sexy Chic

SATURDAY
Saturday night set in the historic New Yorker Hotel Ballroom
The New Yorker Hotel Crystal Ballroom 481 8th Avenue at 34th Street
New York, NY
9pm – 2am
Admission: $30
Dress code: Steppers Sharp (semi-formal)

Steppin’ in Central Park
What’s more New York than hanging out in Central Park at the historic Summit Rock, once home of the prestigious Black community Seneca Village
3pm -7pm
Free and lunch is included
Dress code: Represent with your t-shirt

Music for the weekend provided by Detroit’s own DJ Rockin’ Rodney Mack and New York's DJ Tony Love


Workshops by Dominique Robinson and Shareda Newbern
Participants of the World’s Largest Stepping Contest - Masters Category
11am – 1pm – Workshop with Shareda – all levels
1pm – 3pm – Workshop with Dominique – all levels
Workshops are $20 each and located at Ripley Grier Studios (2 blocks from the host hotel)
Ripley Grier Studios, 520 West 8th Avenue, 16th floor (between 36th and 37th streets), New York, NY

SUNDAY
Brunch in Brooklyn at Rustik Tavern
Rustik Tavern
471 DeKalb Avenue, Brooklyn, New York (G train to Classon Avenue)
11am – 2pm
Dress code: casual



*****Early Bird Package Deals*****


Buy tickets online on the Friday night Meetup page for early bird package deals at (www.chicagostylesteppersnyc.com)
Single ticket prices: Friday set $20, Saturday Main Event $30, Workshops $20 each
Pay by May 30 (Saturday main event $25, Friday and Saturday sets - $40, sets and workshops $75)
Pay by June 30 (Friday and Saturday set - $45, sets and workshops $80)

Host hotel:
The New Yorker Hotel – Located in the heart of New York – All of Manhattan will be at your doorstep when you step outside. You will be in the shopping center of New York with tons of boutiques in walking distance and the famous Macy’s Herald Square one block away from the New Yorker. You are also in walking distance to many attractions including Madison Square Garden which is 1 block away; the Empire State Building is 3 blocks away; Times Square and the Theatre District are a 15 minute walk or quick subway or cab ride away.

Room rate $149/night for single or double occupancy until June 30
For reservations call: 1-800-764-4680, group code: CGYORK

For the latest updates on the weekend, visit our Facebook Page at New York Chicago Style Steppers or visit our meetup page at www.chicagostylesteppersnyc.com
For event tickets and more information about the weekend call or email:
Dolores 646 209-7129 or Dolores0817@optimum.net or
Marty 917 302-3808 or MMajeske@ascap.com

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006
